Question
========
True or false? If the velocity vector and the acceleration vector both point in
the same direction, then the object must be speeding up.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False

Solution
========
True. Acceleration is the change in velocity over time. If acceleration is in the
same direction as velocity, then the velocity vector must be increasing and the
object must be speeding up.
